pkgmetadata.longdescription: Documentation-------------xmindparser is a tool to help you convert xmind file to programmable data type, e.g. json, xml.Detail usage: https://github.com/tobyqin/xmindparserChange Log----------1.0.9- Support and test with Python 3.91.0.8- Handle empty title name for xmind zen in some cases.1.0.6- Keep empty topic title as null but not "[Blank]"1.0.5- Support xmind zen file type.1.0.4- Support parse label feature.1.0.2- Rename config key names.1.0.1- Support parse xmind to xml file type.1.0.0- Support parse xmind to dict data type with Python.- Support parse xmind to json file type.
